thankYou.title: Thank you for testing out the new MySK.
thankYou.subtitle: Before we get started, however, we need to set a few things up.
thankYou.reason: Every academic year, not only do we welcome new students into the school, some information about people inside the school also change. This is an opportunity to add or check the accuracy of the information in your MySK account.
thankYou.usage: Your MySK account is used not for MySK but for other services inside the school as well, so ensure your information is correct.

comingUp.title: Coming up
comingUp.desc: As you set up your MySK account for 2023, you’ll progress through these steps:

notices.title: Final instructions
notices.desc: When you press “Next” on each step, your information will be saved for that step.
notices.warning: Don’t close this tab. You’ll have to restart the set up process all over again if you do.

general.title: About you
general.desc: We have already imported some fields from relevant organizations in the school. Please check for any inaccuracies in the import.
general.inControl: You are in control of your data. <0>Learn how this information is used.</0>

addDose.title: Add dose
addDose.desc: Enter your vaccination info exactly as seen in the Mor Prom app. You can see it by opening the Mor Prom app <0></0> Log in <0></0> Tap “Health Certificate” <0></0> Tap “Vaccination of COVID-19”
addDose.usage: Your vaccine data will only be used in the compilation of school statistics. No one can read your vaccination info except the school.

loggingIn.title: Logging in
loggingIn.lastPage: You’re almost there! This is the last page: you’ll log in to MySK proper after you press “Done.”

checkEmail.title: Check email
checkEmail.success: Check both your old and new email, and click the link on both addresses. <0>Learn more</0>
checkEmail.desc: You’re using “{{email}},” does that seem correct? If not, specify a new one, and we’ll send an email to both your old and your new email addresses to confirm the change. You must click the link on both addresses.

createPassword.title: Create a password
createPassword.success: Password created. You’re all set to start exploring MySK!
createPassword.desc: For the security of you and the school’s data, create a new password for your MySK account. Enter your new password twice to confirm.

common.nextReminder: Remember: your information is not saved until you press “Next.”
